name: War of the Flies
description:
You are the chosen Flower Guardian. Your job is to nurture this flower until it is fully grown.

BEWARE! The gardener left the bug-net open, so hordes of flies, and terrifying Goliath beetles will try to feed on the flower.

THIS CANNOT HAPPEN!

Use the WASD keys and Mouse to control your character to move, shoot and collect water for the parched plant. Ammo must also be collected by defeating the mighty Goliaths. Good Luck!
